sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NM, MEM_REGNO, MEM_NKNM, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_ADDR1, MEM_ADDR2, MEM_QSTN, MEM_ANS, MEM_SNU_DATE, MEM_SCORE, MEM_RANK, MEM_STAT, FILE_NUM) VALUES(#MEM_ID#, #MEM_PASS#, #MEM_NM#, #MEM_REGNO#, #MEM_NKNM#, #MEM_EMAIL#, #MEM_ADDR1#, #MEM_ADDR2#, #MEM_QSTN#, #MEM_ANS#, SYSDATE, #MEM_SCORE#, #MEM_RANK#, #MEM_STAT#, FILE_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL)
